mapper.insert: INSERT INTO welfare (serv_id, serv_name, start_date, end_date, biz_dept, sido, sgg, serv_summary, household, like_subject, sup_period, prov_type, app_way, sup_target, sel_standard, sal_serv) VALUES (#{servId}, #{servName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{bizDept}, #{sido}, #{sgg}, #{servSummary}, #{household}, #{likeSubject}, #{supPeriod}, #{provType}, #{appWay}, #{supTarget}, #{selStandard}, #{salServ})
